price: 17. (Muuse) wuxuu yidhi:Rabbiyow!Waxaad igu galladeysatay darteed (oo denbi dhaaf ah), marnaba dib dambe uguma noqon doono caawiye denbiilayaasha.
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ بِمَآ أَنۡعَمۡتَ عَلَيَّ فَلَنۡ أَكُونَ ظَهِيرٗا لِّلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi bimā anʿamta ʿalayya falan akūna ẓahīran lil'muj'rimīna
